name: Blood Strike
description: A lightweight, fast-paced battle royale shooter designed for quick matches and mobile optimization.

name: Call of Duty Mobile
description: A mobile adaptation of the Call of Duty franchise, featuring multiplayer, battle royale, and ranked gameplay.

name: Farlight 84
description: A sci-fi battle royale with jetpacks, hero abilities, and explosive fast-paced action.

name: Free Fire
description: A wildly popular battle royale with 10-minute matches, unique character skills, and support for low-end phones.

name: Mini Militia - Classic Beta
description: A nostalgic return to the original Mini Militia chaos with LAN and online multiplayer.

name: Mini Militia - War.io
description: A modernized, tournament-ready version of Mini Militia with competitive features and loadouts.

name: Mobile Legends Bang Bang
description: A fast-paced 5v5 MOBA built for mobile with a large hero pool and strategic team fights.

name: PUBG Mobile
description: The mobile version of PUBG featuring realistic gameplay, vehicles, and tactical shooting on large maps.
